title: Front-End Engineer
details: Collaborating with IoT engineers to improve hardware and [[React Native mobile app with Swift and Android]] WiFi connectivity and syncing data performance via [[Bluetooth Low Energy (ESP 32)]]
Implementing [[an enterprise application using React, React Native (iOS and Android), and AWS]] for device management, reporting, and sanitizing device analytic data.
Developing and implementing [[front-end architecture]] to ensure solutions are maintainable, modular, and work well across browsers and devices.
Creating [[wireframes, prototypes, and interfaces]] that meet client requirements.
Creating and designing reusable [[graphic UI components using Material UI]] and building [[navigation components and providing solutions.]]
Deploying a web app, connecting to [[Cognito for authentication]] for clients to [[various cloud environments]] with the use of modern tools such as [[AWS Amplify]]
Fetching a large amount of data from the back-end using API gateway Restful service
Building [[Rest API]] using [[Serverless Framework, AWS API Gateway, Lambda, and DynamoDB]]
Managing [[TestFlight builds, App Store, and Google Play release.]]

title: Full Stack Developer
details: Implemented SaaS Application using [[React, Redux, Contentful, Algolia, AWS,]] and [[MySQL.]]
Comminicated with Designer to build pixel perfect [[Wordpress website]] using [[PHP, jQuery, HTML5 and CSS3.]]
Developed [[OCR API]] using [[Node.js, Regex and Azure Computer vision]]

title: Software Engineer Intern
details: Shared and version-contralled source code with [[Gitlab.]]
Worked independently and collaborated with team members in remote oﬃces.
